channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reolink’s New Floodlight Security Cam has AI Search Skills At No Extra Cost
item.description: Reolink Elite Floodlight WiFi goes live with no-extra-fee AI search functionality, which is processed on the device itself.

item.title: Google Confirms Pixel 10 In Surprise Reveal
item.description: This is the Pixel 10, and this time it's not a leak. Google has taken steps to get ahead of the discussion by confirming the Pixel 10 via the Google S...

item.title: The Top AI Terms People Keep Getting Wrong At Work And Why They Matter
item.description: Misusing AI terms like hallucination, bias, and automation bias can lead to costly mistakes at work. Here’s what they actually mean and why they matte...

item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, Rip Currents And A Lasting Cultural Legacy
item.description: The tragedy of a rip current and a cultural icon. Perspectives on the legacy of Malcolm-Jamal Warner.

item.title: New Report Says Xbox’s ‘Fable’ May Not Release Until 2027
item.description: Fable, another big Xbox game, may not arrive in 2026 after already being delayed from 2025 according to a new report.

item.title: Casual cruelty

item.title: Resilience is a practice
item.description: It’s easy to imagine that we should do our work and then, when it doesn’t work as we hope, improvise to fix it. But perhaps our work is to show up rea...

item.title: Lunging

item.title: Finding the difficult work
